source.d6294631:
import nltk
import re
nltk.download('stopwords')
from nltk.corpus import stopwords
from nltk.stem.porter import PorterStemmer
corpus=[]
# x_change = df[['Review']]
for i in range(len(df)):
    review = re.sub('[^a-zA-z]',' ',df['Review'][i])
    review = review.split()
    ps = PorterStemmer()
    review =[ps.stem(i) for i in review if not i in set(stopwords.words('english'))]
    review =' '.join(review)
    corpus.append(review)
source.41d641c4:
titl=[]
for i in range(len(df)):
    revi = re.sub('[^a-zA-z]',' ',df['Review_Title'][i])
    revi = revi.split()
    ps = PorterStemmer()
    revi =[ps.stem(i) for i in revi if not i in set(stopwords.words('english'))]
    revi =' '.join(revi)
    titl.append(revi)
